dmca.title: Letter of retraction for www.yonextennis.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Stephany Santos [mailto:stephany@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Friday, June 16, 2006 3:57 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Letter of retraction for www.yonextennis.com 
Subject: Letter of retraction for www.yonextennis.com 



Hi George,



         Please find a letter of retraction attached for 
www.yonextennis.com <http://www.yonextennis.com/>  on behalf of our
client Head Racquets. Thank you for your assistance in this matter.

 

 

Stephany Santos
LMS Associate
Net Enforcers, Inc. 
stephany@netenforcers.com <mailto:youremailaddress@netenforcers.com>  
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Experts...... 

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.


June 16, 2006



Designated Agent
George Poletes
1333 Stemmons Pwy, STE 110
Dallas, TX 75207 


Re: Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property: Yonextennis.com / Head Racquets

To Whom It May Concern:

     This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent referencing www.yonextennis.com and our client Head Racquets.  It has been brought to our attention that our client Head Racquets has requested for this case to be closed because www.yonextennis.com has entered into an internet dealer agreement with Head Racquets.  This agreement grants them permission to use the intellectual property and trademarked logos of Head Racquets...  Please accept this letter as a notice of retraction and take no further action against this website. In addition, all cases concerning www.yonextennis.com and Head Racquets can be closed. Thank you.




Sincerely, 

Stephany Santos
LMS Associate
Net Enforcers, Inc. 
Stephany@netenforcers.com
Compliance.Management@netenforcers.com
